(23704, 25322).name: ECMWF
(23704, 25322).label: provider
(23704, 25322).description: The European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts, an organization providing weather forecasts, climate data, and research support

(23704, 25322).name: ERA5
(23704, 25322).label: dataset
(23704, 25322).description: The fifth generation of ECMWF atmospheric reanalyses, providing global atmospheric data for climate research and applications

(23704, 25322).name: ERA-Interim
(23704, 25322).label: dataset
(23704, 25322).description: A previous generation of ECMWF atmospheric reanalyses, used for climate research and providing global atmospheric data

(23704, 25322).name: Greenland Ice Sheet
(23704, 25322).label: location
(23704, 25322).description: A large ice mass located on the island of Greenland, playing a significant role in global sea level and climate regulation

(23704, 25322).name: Programme for Monitoring of the Greenland Ice Sheet (PROMICE)
(23704, 25322).label: project
(23704, 25322).description: An initiative for monitoring and studying the Greenland Ice Sheet, focusing on its mass balance, dynamics, and climate interactions

(23704, 25322).name: Greenland Analogue Project (GAP)
(23704, 25322).label: project
(23704, 25322).description: A research project aimed at understanding past and present climate conditions in Greenland, using analogues to improve predictions

(23704, 25322).name: AWS
(23704, 25322).label: instrument
(23704, 25322).description: Automatic Weather Stations, devices used for collecting meteorological data such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed

(23704, 25322).name: meteorological station observations
(23704, 25322).label: variable
(23704, 25322).description: Data collected from weather stations, including measurements of temperature, precipitation, wind, and other atmospheric conditions
